page.title: 01CROSSGATES AREA -AN OVERVIEW
page.content: The area containing Crossgates and Halbeath is historically linked with { {farming mining}and{communications.} Today farming is still the predominant activity in the area, although the open-cast mine at Crossgates, the new regional road, the M90 motorway, the Lauder technical College and the influx of commuters have all had their effects upon the area. The village of Halbeath is almost a part of Dunfermline now, with the Technical college its main feature. It is in the tiny village of Coaledge, near Crossgates, that the image of the past is most readily brought to mind: the hand of time has left little mark upon Coaledge!
